item.title: i use this, now 50% more social.
item.description: We've just pushed a major update to iusethis, adding several social features and updating the commenting system with support for replies. To improve performance, we've also added a new caching system, to allow us to cache more data for logged-in users. Find your friends Looking up your contacts in GMail is a feature that we've wanted for a long time, but we did not want to compromise users by asking for their passwords.

item.title: Happy to see that Perl is getting some love from the mac crowd
item.description: Seen in my twitter feed: 22:35 < danielpunkass> @mjtsai Heh - I had high hopes for python, but ... 22:35 < danielpunkass> perl -e "" 0.00s user 22:35 < danielpunkass> ruby -e "" 0.01s user 22:35 < danielpunkass> python -c "" 0.08s user 22:40 < mjtsai> @danielpunkass Infinitely slower than Perl! In case you were wondering, Daniel and Michael were discussing this post from @gruber.

item.title: ‹‹A vampire story›› now out for the mac.
item.description: Too bad the the game is plagued by the most annoying sense of humor ever. I suggest getting World of Goo instead if you are looking for a new game to play on your mac.
